sqlMap.select: SELECT O.ORDER_CODE as orderCode, O.USER_CODE as userCode, U.USER_ID as userId, O.ORDER_USED_MILEAGE as orderUsedMileage, O.ORDER_STATE as orderState, O.REG_ID as orderRegId, O.REG_DATE as orderRegDate, O.REG_IP as orderRegIp, OI.ORDER_INFO_CODE as orderInfoCode, OI.ITEM_CODE as itemCode, OI.ORDER_ITEM_MARKET_PRICE as orderItemMarketPrice, OI.ORDER_ITEM_SELL_PRICE, OI.ORDER_ITEM_PURCHASE_PRICE, OP.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE as orderTotalPrice, OI.DISCOUNT_REASON_CODE, DR.DISCOUNT_REASON_NAME, OI.ORDER_ITEM_AMOUNT, OI.ORDER_ITEM_VERIFY, OI.ORDER_ITEM_RECOM, OC.INFO_CNT_PER_ORDER FROM ORDERING O, USER U, (SELECT ORDER_CODE, COUNT(ORDER_INFO_CODE) AS INFO_CNT_PER_ORDER FROM ORDER_INFO GROUP BY ORDER_CODE) OC, (SELECT O2.ORDER_CODE, SUM(OI2.ORDER_ITEM_SELL_PRICE) AS ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE FROM ORDERING O2, ORDER_INFO OI2 WHERE O2.ORDER_CODE = OI2.ORDER_CODE GROUP BY O2.ORDER_CODE) OP, ORDER_INFO OI LEFT JOIN DISCOUNT_REASON DR ON OI.DISCOUNT_REASON_CODE = DR.DISCOUNT_REASON_CODE WHERE O.ORDER_CODE = OI.ORDER_CODE AND OP.ORDER_CODE = O.ORDER_CODE AND OC.ORDER_CODE = O.ORDER_CODE AND O.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE;

select date_format(O.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m') as period, SUM(OI.ORDER_ITEM_SELL_PRICE) AS totalSellPrice, SUM(OI.ORDER_ITEM_PURCHASE_PRICE) AS totalPurchasePrice, SUM(O.ORDER_USED_MILEAGE) AS totalUsedMileage from ORDERING O, ORDER_INFO OI WHERE DATE_FORMAT(O.REG_DATE, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y') AND OI.ORDER_CODE = O.ORDER_CODE group by date_format(O.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m');
